data.description: a wrapper of ReadLine with Bash-like <TAB>
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Have not chosen Term::ReadLine::BashTab since Term::ReadLine itself
    is already a wrapper of all stuff under namespace Term::ReadLine.
    Besides, this module offers different functionality against
    Term::ReadLine::*. Term::ReadLine has a very simple built-in <TAB>
    feature, while this one behaves more similar to <TAB> in unix bash
    shell.
